mainText:
This is really really sad for all of us..his fans. I think i have not
been this sad about the passing away of a CEO of a Co. ever.
 
God sometimes takes such brilliant, innovative and great human beings
earlier. I guess it is HIS way of letting us know what we are going to
miss the most. 
 
May his family have the courage to bear this deep loss.
 
My condolences & prayers.
author: Ajitesh
